PERSONA:
meet arthur thompson, a 68-year-old retired accountant who resides in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. born and raised in the united states, arthur is a proud american and identifies as a white non-hispanic male. he has lived a fulfilling life, having graduated from a prestigious university with a postgraduate degree in accounting. his educational background has served him well, allowing him to secure a comfortable lifestyle, with a family income ranging from $90,000 to less than $100,000.

arthur is a devoted mormon, actively practicing his faith at the local church of jesus christ of latter-day saints. he attends religious services more than once a week and has a deep connection with his community. his conservative values and ideology align with his republican party affiliation, and he is an ardent supporter of conservative policies. despite being a registered voter, arthur's involvement in politics is mostly limited to voting in elections and occasional discussions with friends and family.

arthur's personal life has been marked by both joy and sorrow. he is a widower, having lost his loving wife a few years ago. the couple was married for over 40 years and had two children together, who are now grown with kids of their own. arthur cherishes the memories he made with his wife and continues to prioritize family values.

as a retired individual, arthur has ample time to pursue his interests. he volunteers at a local community center, where he helps with financial literacy programs for low-income families. this endeavor allows him to give back to the community and stay engaged with society. in his free time, arthur enjoys reading history books, playing golf, and staying connected with friends and family through social media and online platforms, which he uses several times a day.

arthur's life is characterized by his strong sense of faith, conservative values, and commitment to community service. he is a proud american, devoted to his family, and dedicated to making a positive impact in his community.
